titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parlament [sic] presented to the Kings Majesty at Oxford, wherein they declare their humble desires concerning the L. Kymbolton and Mr. Pym : together with the propositions of peace, agreed on by both
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
